attributes.action: inform Jack Straw he's a toss pot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have watched with dismay as a student Jack Straw brimming with fresh ideas and hope has been turned into a new labour stooge and therefore a toss pot. Give Michael Shields an appeal and release Ronnie Biggs or be forever known as a toss pot.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
